Welcome to NEOChain¶

NEOChain (neochain) is a Network Evolution Observation library for Blockchain networks. This specially designed python library can provide tools to detect community structures in massive networks like Blockchain and also capable of merging one or more timed snapshot of transaction data into one large snapshot without losing any nodes to better understand the evolution of the network.

Overview¶

NEOChain is a specially designed python package for observation of evaluation of network in Blockchain networks. It can also handle networks other than blockchain. This package facilitates -

  • Fast and memory efficient community detection in large-scale graphs
  • Selection of top N detected communities in any timed snapshot of the graph
  • Creation of sub-graphs based on detected communities
  • Merging of graphs and sub-graphs based on detected communities
  • Finding similarity measures between a pair of communities
  • Finding the most similar pair of communities

With NEOChain you can detect communities and observe network evolution over time.

Free Usage¶

This python package is being developed for educational purposes and intended to be used for educational purposes only. Any interested person can freely modify/edit/distribute this python package under MIT license. Issues and Bugs can be reported on GitHub
